word-spacing: normal; word-break: normal; line-height: 1.5; tab-size: 4; hyphens: none;"><span>structure Multivector (n : Nat) where
</span>  coeffs : Array Int  -- Coefficients for basis vectors
  deriving Repr

def geometric_product (a b : Multivector n) : Multivector n :=
  let inner := a.coeffs.zipWith b.coeffs (fun x y =&gt; if x = y then x * y else 0)
  let wedge := a.coeffs.zipWith b.coeffs (fun x y =&gt; if x ≠ y then x * y else 0)
  { coeffs := inner.add wedge }</code></pre></div></div></li><li style="font-family: TwitterChirp, System; margin-top: 0.5em;"><div dir="ltr" class="css-146c3p1 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-37j5jr r-a023e6 r-rjixqe r-16dba41" style="color: rgb(231, 233, 234);"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">Example:</span></span></div><ul style="display: block;     let mut result = Cl8Multivector::new();
    for i in 0..256 {
        for j in 0..256 {
            let k = i ^ j;
            let sign = if (i &amp; j).count_ones() % 2 == 0 { 1.0 } else { -1.0 };
            result.coefficients[k] += sign * self.coefficients[i] * other.coefficients[j];
        }
    }
    result
}

fn from_prime_version(prime: u64, version: u64) -&gt; Self {
    let mut mv = Cl8Multivector::new();
    let idx = PRIMES.iter().position(|&amp;p| p == prime).unwrap_or(0);
    mv.coefficients[1 &lt;&lt; idx] = 1.0;
    if version &gt; 0 {
        mv.coefficients[(1 &lt;&lt; idx) * version as usize % 256] = 1.0;
    }
    mv

    accounts: &amp;[AccountInfo],

) -&gt; ProgramResult {
    let instruction = Instruction::unpack(instruction_data)?;
    let account_iter = &amp;mut accounts.iter();
    let account = next_account_info(account_iter)?;
    let state_account = next_account_info(account_iter)?;
    let clock = Clock::get()?;</span></span></span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1adg3ll r-1g7jtus r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">match instruction {
    Instruction::CreateAccount {
        data,
        code,
        zkp,
        tags,
        ipfs_cids,
        embedding,
        bert_embedding,
        prime,
        multivector,
    } =&gt; {
        if !account.is_writable {
            return Err(ProgramError::InvalidAccountData);
        }
        let mut semantic_account = SemanticAccount {
            data,
            code,
            zkp,
            tags,
            ipfs_cids,
            hashes: vec![Sha256::digest(&amp;data).into()],
            embedding,
            bert_embedding,
            prime,
            multivector,
        };
        semantic_account.serialize(&amp;mut &amp;mut account.data.borrow_mut()[..])?;
        msg!("Created account with prime {}", prime);
    }
    Instruction::WriteChunk {
        tags,
        ipfs_cids,
        embedding,
        bert_embedding,
        multivector,
    } =&gt; {
        let mut semantic_account = SemanticAccount::try_from_slice(&amp;account.data.borrow())?;
        semantic_account.tags.extend(tags);
        semantic_account.ipfs_cids.extend(ipfs_cids);
        semantic_account.embedding = embedding;
        semantic_account.bert_embedding = bert_embedding;
        semantic_account.multivector = multivector;
        semantic_account.serialize(&amp;mut &amp;mut account.data.borrow_mut()[..])?;
        msg!("Updated account");
    }
    Instruction::Query { trunc_hash, prime } =&gt; {
        let mut state = ProgramState::try_from_slice(&amp;state_account.data.borrow())?;
        if state.n_hash != trunc_hash {
            return Err(ProgramError::InvalidArgument);
        }
        let semantic_account = SemanticAccount::try_from_slice(&amp;account.data.borrow())?;
        if semantic_account.prime != prime {
            return Err(ProgramError::InvalidArgument);
        }
        let mv = Cl8Multivector::from_prime_version(prime, 2);
        let result_mv = mv.geometric_product(&amp;mv);
        msg!("Queried multivector: {:?}", result_mv.coefficients[0]);
    }
}
